title: Augmented Reality-Based Operational Amplifier Practical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: AR-based intensive training for current practitioners to bridge theory-practice gaps

learning_goals: Learners can analyze input-output signals of operational amplifier circuits implemented on an actual breadboard in real-time using an AR application.
Learners can simulate output voltage changes when modifying resistor/capacitor values via an AR interface and record experimental data.
Learners can explain the operational principles of operational amplifiers by integrating 3D circuit models with theoretical explanations in an augmented reality environment.

resources: Personal Breadboard and Basic Electronic Components

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
